string-array.name: notes_list
string-array.item: Android officialy supports autosizing. For implementing dynamic size you should set autoSizeTextType attribute to uniform and set autoSizeMaxTextSize and autoSizeMinTextSize attributes to your desired size

string-array.name: notes
string-array.item: I am working with fragment architecture i designed login page in a fragment, i want to remove the only login fragment from back stack after user login successful and open another fragment, please help me

Is theres way to change the text size to fit screen-width ? i have Header with long title, the problem is on small size screen that title goes to another line. i would like to change font size to fit the whole text in 1 line
